TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit TextNormalizingTransformer extends Microsoft.ML.Data.OneToOneTransformerBase
Public NotInheritable Class TextNormalizingTransformer Inherits OneToOneTransformerBase

Docs.summary: A text normalization transform that allows normalizing text case, removing diacritical marks, punctuation marks and/or numbers. The transform operates on text input as well as vector of tokens/text (vector of ReadOnlyMemory).
